title: PBE:Shop
body: When will the PBE Shop be opened again {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Scratch that, seeing a few reports of it not working for some players still. Let me know if it works or not when you get a chance to check!
Just checked, both the store and crafting are down, my RP is down to 3000 and my BE is down to 5.
